channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: Mother Seraphina Marie, FDM, talks about her reversion to the Catholic Faith. Hosted by Marcus Grodi. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Joyful Mysteries of the Annunciation, Visitation, Nativity, Presentation and Finding and its graces and virtues. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Cambodge, La Premiere Generation
channel.desc: Trois jeunes Cambodgiens qui ont vu leur vie transform?e par leur foi catholique. Cette ?mission, pr?sente la nouvelle g?n?ration de catholiques qui repr?sentent la renaissance de cette nation. Il y a des d?cennies le r?gime brutal de Pol Pot avait mis en place d?inf?mes champs de la mort, dont on ressent toujours la brutalit? dans l??me de ce pays d?Asie. Nos protagonistes sont t?moins de la renaissance et du renouveau que l??glise catholique apporte au Cambodge. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother Angelica lends her wisdom into Mary's trust and Corpus Christi. (FRENCH). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Wild Goose
channel.desc: Fr. Dave Pivonka, TOR, explains how Catholics are granted a chance to encounter the Holy Spirit at Mass. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: Mother Seraphina Marie, FDM, talks about her reversion to the Catholic Faith. Hosted by Marcus Grodi. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Brides Of Christ Sisters Of Our Lady Immaculate
channel.desc: An inspiring portrait of a new religious community in Canada, the Sisters of Our Lady Immaculate (S.O.L.I), as they go about their daily lives, teaching and answering God?s call for them to be true Brides of Christ. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Web Of Faith 2.0
channel.desc: Today?s viewer emails address the Church on earth, the notion of ?one world religion,? how to honor and keep holy the Sabbath Day, whether the blind may serve in the Body of Christ, and how to evangelize Muslims. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: Dynamic husband and wife radio team Jim and Joy Pinto bring their powerful witness to daytime TV with special guests and topics focusing on marriage, family, and pro-life issues. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: I Am With You
channel.desc: Biblical hope is the assurance that God?s blessings and good experiences lie in our future. Hope inspires us, energizes us and invigorates us to live differently. It lasts forever. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Church Through The Ages
channel.desc: Fr. Connor discusses the role of Synods or gatherings of bishops in Jerusalem, Alexandria and Antioch. He examines the place given to significant churches, such as St. Peter's, and the Cathedral of Rome, St. John Lateran. The contributions of Emperor Constantine are noted as well as his capital of Constantinople. Finally, the works of Ss. Leo the Great, Cyprian, Irenaeus and Gregory the Great are mentioned. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Journey Home
channel.desc:
Justine Callis was raised in a Christian home, and became a successful gymnast. Her athletic pursuits led her to Arizona, where she plugged into an Evangelical megachurch and her faith began to grow. She also worked in Evangelical campus ministry at Arizona State, where she was coaching.
When she met Catholics who were on fire for their faith, it shocked her; she?d thought Catholicism was a ?dead religion.? She began to explore Catholicism, especially the doctrine of the Eucharist and the concept of a Magisterium, and over the course of two years of prayer and study, discerned that God was calling her to become Catholic. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Signs And Glory: The Gospel Of John
channel.desc: Dr. Timothy O'Donnell discusses St. John 5:41-6:42. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Gospel Of St. Matthew
channel.desc: Dr. Gray talks about the mission of the apostles and Jesus performing His mighty deeds on the Sabbath. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Most Holy Name Of Jesus
channel.desc: From the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word lead this inspirational prayer invoking the Holy Name of Jesus. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Grab Your Catechism With Fr. Connor
channel.desc: Conscience may be formed in accordance with moral principles. Fr. Charles talks about how this is imposed not by man, but by God as a voice, calling man to do what is good and avoid what is evil. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Our Lady In Scripture & Tradition
channel.desc: Fr. Apostoli discusses how Mary has been invoked with the title "Help of Christians" since the early Church during times of trial, distress and persecutions. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Grandparents
channel.desc: A Catholic missionary attributes his strong relationship with Christ to a small gift that was given to him by his grandmother. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: World Over
channel.desc: Robert Royal and Father Gerald?Murray analyze the first week of Pope Leo XIV's pontificate. Diane Montagna on the Pope's audience with journalists. Dr. Walid Phares on President Trump's Middle East visit. And, Patricia Heaton on her new movie. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Women Of Grace
channel.desc: In this multi-part series, Msgr. Arthur Calkins traces the history of the consecration to Jesus through Mary, and provides a detailed explanation of St. John Paul II?s theology and teaching of the Marian consecration. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: From The Heart, With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: Serenity of soul is found by persevering in praying and striving to live out the Beatitudes, each carrying a blessing for those who obtain its grace. As Mother tells us, we must put into practice the virtues we seek. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Church Universal
channel.desc: Fr. Joseph welcomes members of the Source and Summit Institute to speak about their efforts to help parishes in renewal of the liturgy and the spread of the New Evangelization. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Mystery Of John Paul Ii
channel.desc: A documentary on the spiritual lives of Cardinal Stefan Wyszynski and John Paul II, and how their efforts inspired the Polish people and contributed to the fall of Communism. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fr. Apostoli: Mother Teresa, Servant Of The Poor
channel.desc: They are for Mother Teresa, the possibility to give back something to Jesus. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford reflects on the Epistle to the Ephesians, the awesome love of God for us, and we grieve Him by our sins. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Church And The Poor
channel.desc: Fr. Ho Lung welcomes Donna Scira to discuss how participation of the laity to the Missionaries of the Poor brings profound experiences that deeply affect their lives and others. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Brides Of Christ Sisters Of Our Lady Immaculate
channel.desc: An inspiring portrait of a new religious community in Canada, the Sisters of Our Lady Immaculate (S.O.L.I), as they go about their daily lives, teaching and answering God?s call for them to be true Brides of Christ. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Cat Chat
channel.desc: Gerald, Denise and the kids go on the hike of their lives and show why you need the sacraments along the way. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: International Children?s Rosary
channel.desc: Experience the innocence and love children bring to Jesus and Our Lady in prayer as members of the Children?s Rosary prayer group lead the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.desc: Mother Angelica and the Poor Clares of Perpetual Adoration recite the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (10 minutes).

channel.title: Web Of Faith 2.0
channel.desc: Today?s viewer emails address the Church on earth, the notion of ?one world religion,? how to honor and keep holy the Sabbath Day, whether the blind may serve in the Body of Christ, and how to evangelize Muslims. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Doctors Of The Church
channel.desc: Destined for a political career, St. Ambrose of Milan instead made serving God his life?s mission. As one of our greatest bishops, he defended the authentic teachings of the Church and opened up Scripture to the masses. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: They Might Be Saints Fr. Augustus Tolton
channel.desc: ?Miracle Hunter? Michael O?Neill examines the sainthood cause of the first black priest in American history, Venerable Augustus Tolton, who overcame tremendous challenges both inside and outside the Catholic Church. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc:
Justine Callis was raised in a Christian home, and became a successful gymnast. Her athletic pursuits led her to Arizona, where she plugged into an Evangelical megachurch and her faith began to grow. She also worked in Evangelical campus ministry at Arizona State, where she was coaching.
When she met Catholics who were on fire for their faith, it shocked her; she?d thought Catholicism was a ?dead religion.? She began to explore Catholicism, especially the doctrine of the Eucharist and the concept of a Magisterium, and over the course of two years of prayer and study, discerned that God was calling her to become Catholic. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Agony, Scourging, Crowning with Thorns, Carrying the Cross and Crucifixion help us to accept pain and perseverance to the very end. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Cambodge Le Christ Mutile
channel.desc: Pendant le r?gime des Khmers rouges au Cambodge, le parti a tu? environ 1,7 million de personnes, dont pr?s de la moiti? ?taient catholiques. Il y a une trentaine d'ann?es, cependant, l'?glise d?vast?e a connu une renaissance dans un pays dont la majorit? de la population est de confession bouddhiste. Personne ne r?sume mieux cela que l'?v?que ? Kike ? (comme on l'appelle localement), le pr?fet apostolique de Battambang. Il a fond? le centre Arrupe dans le nord-ouest du Cambodge en 2001 avec l'intention de restaurer la dignit? et les droits des personnes victimes des mines terrestres gr?ce ? la possibilit? d'?tudier et de travailler. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Speaking Of Saints
channel.desc: Susan Conroy, long-time friend of Mother Teresa of Calcutta, examines how she looked at prayer in our everyday lives. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Cambodge, La Premiere Generation
channel.desc: Trois jeunes Cambodgiens qui ont vu leur vie transform?e par leur foi catholique. channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Faith And Life
channel.desc: Fr. Martin O?Hagan, a parish priest in County Down, Ireland, moonlights as a member of the multi-platinum music group ?The Priests.? They once held the world record as the fastest-selling UK debut for a classical act. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc:
Justine Callis was raised in a Christian home, and became a successful gymnast. Her athletic pursuits led her to Arizona, where she plugged into an Evangelical megachurch and her faith began to grow. She also worked in Evangelical campus ministry at Arizona State, where she was coaching.
When she met Catholics who were on fire for their faith, it shocked her; she?d thought Catholicism was a ?dead religion.? She began to explore Catholicism, especially the doctrine of the Eucharist and the concept of a Magisterium, and over the course of two years of prayer and study, discerned that God was calling her to become Catholic. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Jeanne Jugan: Yesterday And Today
channel.desc: A look at the life and ministry of the Little Sisters of the Poor, founded by Jeanne Jugan with a special mission of hospitality, particularly towards the elderly. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The "reformation"
channel.desc: Calvin?s controversial impact on the Protestant Reformation, and the divisive role of Calvinist preachers in the Wars of Religion. See how the faithful rallied in opposition and worked fervently to bring many back to Catholicism. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Explore With The Miracle Hunter
channel.desc: The Italian city of Assisi gave rise to two of history?s most celebrated saints. ?Miracle Hunter? Michael O?Neill follows the trail of St. Francis, the first to bear the stigmata, and St. Clare, his wonder-working follower. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Real Life Catholic
channel.desc: Chris Stefanick enjoys Louisiana's food and culture as he harvests crawfish with the campus ministry of the University of Louisiana at Lafayette. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints For Today
channel.desc: Father John Horgan explores the life of Blessed Charles of Mt. Argus and his special gifts of healing. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother talks about the corporal and spiritual works of mercy and how to live out these works in our daily lives. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: God's Blueprint For A Happy Life
channel.desc: God has a plan for the family. Today, our hosts discuss the importance of piety in relation to significant others in our lives, and show how justice regarding families and our country leads to happiness. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Biblical Story Of The Mass
channel.desc: Hosts Tom Nash and Fr. Wade Menezes discuss Passover, Yom Kippur and the sacrifice of the Mass. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Glorious Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Divine Child Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite the litany of the Divine Child Jesus from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Scripture And Tradition With Fr. Mitch Pacwa
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch examines (Proto) Isaiah, chapters 21 and 22, the visions of catastrophe they describe, and the meanings behind these visions. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Grandparents
channel.desc: Fr. James explores how a grandparent?s faith can be a powerful influence on their grandchildren, especially in circumstances where they don?t live in practicing households. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: Mother Seraphina Marie, FDM, talks about her reversion to the Catholic Faith. Hosted by Marcus Grodi. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Women Of Grace
channel.desc: The consecration to Our Lady profoundly shaped the spiritual life and pontificate of St. John Paul II. Monsignor Arthur Calkins shares his unique insight on its history, from the early days of the Church to the present. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! First Papal Audience With Pope Leo Xiv
channel.desc: Live from the Vatican, Pope Leo XIV delivers his weekly address to the faithful in what will be his first public address as Pope since his election. (75 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Gospel Glimpses
channel.desc: Unlike scholars who often contradict each other, the best explainers of Scripture are the saints. Today, discover why we must pay attention to them, because they?re dauntless in their faith and truly love the church. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Chris Alar, M.I.C. helps viewers get a better understanding of the Divine Mercy message, and shares powerful, real life examples of people who live Divine Mercy in their every day lives. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Get A Life In Christ
channel.desc: Fr, Benedict is developing the theme over several episodes of the gift of the virtues being powers afforded us from God. This episode is devoted to his discussion of "Whatever Happened to Virtue?" It is no longer politically correct to be virtuous and, of course, Fr. Benedict takes exception to that position. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford develops the idea that our deepest yearnings are put there by God due to His great love for us. He wants us to learn to love Him as much as He love us, impossible though that may be. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Vaticano
channel.desc: We reflect on our new Pope?s challenges. Discover the Church's role during World War II. Hear from Cardinal Czerny on the Conclave. Explore the Caravaggio exhibition. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Jeanne Jugan: Yesterday And Today
channel.desc: A look at the life and ministry of the Little Sisters of the Poor, founded by Jeanne Jugan with a special mission of hospitality, particularly towards the elderly. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Roamin? Catholic
channel.desc: As Rob prepares and attempts to leave for back to back trips, he and Pete realize the meaning of being a good host and a good houseguest, just as Mary was to her cousin Elizabeth. (30 minutes).
